page.title: 14Cropwell Bishop, Our Village
page.content: .The Fields are green and yellow in the Spring and Summer but are brown { in the Winter.Oil-seed rape and corn and wheat are grown in the fields. I have seen lots of daisies,buttercups and dandelions , and cowslips in the fields. There are three shops in Cropwell Bishop, the Post Office,the Co-op and the Grocery shop. There are also two public houses, The Chequers and The Wheatwheaf. There are two village teams, a football club and a cricket club. There used to be{Men's Institute,}with their headquarters at the Memorial Hall, playing cribbage, snooker, billiards,etc. against other villages in the area, but this ceased in the late 1960's, although the billiard table is still present in the Hall. The{Women's Institute}is still active.
